pageProduct.name: Alkira Glow Hero Vitamin C Facial Serum 30ml
pageProduct.description:
Common Uses

Key Benefits:
• Contains skin plumping polysaccharides using Hyalurosmooth tm , a botanical alternative to Hyaluronic Acid
• Contains one of the world’s richest sources of vitamin C, Kakadu Plum paired with Quandong and Finger Lime Caviar to break down pigmentation and promote a radiant complexion.
• Complexion correcting natural fruit enzymes of Pineapple and Papaya to sweep away dead skin cells
• Radiance enhancing Turmeric, Rosehip, Carrot and Mango
• Contains Willow Bark, a natural source of BHA (Beta Hydroxy Acid) to gently exfoliate skin to reveal a fresh, glowing complexion

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Propanediol, Glycerin, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Terminalia Ferdinandiana (Kakadu Plum) Fruit Extract, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Ascorbic Acid, Santalum Acuminatum (Quandong) Fruit Extract, Punica Granatum (Pomegranate) Fruit Extract, Citrus Australasica (Finger Lime) Fruit Extract, Ananas Sativus (Pineapple) Fruit Extract, Lycium Barbarum (Goji) Fruit Extract, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Fruit Extract, Carica Papaya (Papaya) Fruit Extract, Salix Alba (Willow) Bark Extract, Rosa Canina (Rosehip) Fruit Oil, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Euterpe Oleracea (Acai) Fruit Oil, Adansonia Digitata (Baobab) Seed Oil, Cassia Angustifolia Seed Polysaccharide,  Citrus Reticulata (Tangerine) Peel Oil,  Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Root Extract,  Cetearyl Olivate, Carrageenan, Xanthan Gum, Sorbitan Olivate, Tocopherol, Glycolic Acid, Sodium Glycolate, Biosaccharide Gum-1, Sodium Levulinate, Sodium Anisate, Squalane, Glyceryl Caprylate, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Sodium Hydroxide, Benzyl Alcohol, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Limonene* Linalool* Beta-Carotene (CI 75130), *Allergens

Directions

Apply to face, neck and decolletage morning and/or evening after cleansing/tonic. Follow with Vitamin C + Facial Oil for intense hydration and either Radiant Facial Moisturiser or Antioxidant Night Cream.
